Question: Six weeks later, on the first anniversary of his coronation, this person defeated Austria and Russia at Austerlitz.
Hints: During the ____ic Wars he was taken seriously by the British press as a dangerous tyrant, poised to invade.
In terms of impact on events, it was more than this person's personality that took effect.
The couple had one child, this person Francis Joseph Charles (1811–1832), known from birth as the King of Rome.
